item.description:
Get sandwiches/juice/baked goods/hot foods downstairs, meet upstairs. I have yet to see it, but apparently they have an elevator you can ask to use if you have mobility issues.

Our second meeting (sorry I took so long to update this message.) More socializing; maybe talk about if we should have some sort of "purpose" other than just hanging out with cool people.

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: The New Haven Vegan September Meetup
